option.description: EC above 8MHz; PFM set to high power
option.name: ECH

option.description: EC for 500kHz to 8MHz; PFM set to medium power
option.name: ECM

option.description: EC below 500kHz; PFM set to low power
option.name: ECL

option.description: HS (crystal oscillator) above 4MHz; PFM set to high power
option.name: HS

option.description: XT (crystal oscillator) above 500kHz, below 4MHz; PFM set to medium power
option.name: XT

option.description: LP (crystal oscillator) optimized for 32.768kHz; PFM set to low power
option.name: LP

setting.name: RSTOSC
setting.description: Power-up default value for COSC bits

option.description: EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits
option.name: EXT4X

option.description: HFINTOSC with 2x PLL, with OSCFRQ = 16 MHz and CDIV = 1:1 (FOSC = 32 MHz)
option.name: HFINTPLL

option.description: HFINTOSC with OSCFRQ= 32 MHz and CDIV = 1:1
option.name: HFINT32

option.description: CLKOUT function is enabled; FOSC/4 clock appears at OSC2
option.name: ON

option.description: CLKOUT function is disabled; i/o or oscillator function on OSC2
option.name: OFF

option.description: Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed
option.name: ON

option.description: The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software
option.name: OFF

option.description: MCLR pin is Master Clear function
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR pin function is port defined function
option.name: OFF

option.description: Brown-out Reset Enabled, SBOREN bit is ignored
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in sleep; SBOREN is ignored
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: Brown-out reset enabled according to SBOREN bit
option.name: SBOREN

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (VBOR) is set to 2.7V
option.name: HI

option.description: Zero-cross detect circuit is disabled at POR.
option.name: OFF

option.description: Zero-cross detect circuit is always enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be cleared and set only once in software
option.name: ON

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be set and cleared repeatedly by software
option.name: OFF

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a reset
option.name: ON

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a reset
option.name: OFF

option.description: Divider ratio 1:65536; software control of WDTPS
option.name: WDTCPS_31

option.description: WDT enabled/disabled by SWDTEN bit in WDTCON0
option.name: SWDTEN

option.description: WDT enabled while sleep=0, suspended when sleep=1; SWDTEN ignored
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: WDT enabled regardless of sleep; SWDTEN ignored
option.name: ON

option.description: window delay = 87.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_0

option.description: window delay = 75 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_1

option.description: window delay = 62.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_2

option.description: window delay = 50 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_3

option.description: window delay = 37.5 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_4

option.description: window delay = 25 percent of time; no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_5

option.description: window always open (100%); no software control; keyed access required
option.name: WDTCWS_6

option.description: window always open (100%); software control; keyed access not required
option.name: WDTCWS_7

option.description: WDT reference clock is the 31.0kHz LFINTOSC output
option.name: LFINTOSC

option.description: WDT reference clock is the 31.25 kHz HFINTOSC
option.name: HFINTOSC

option.description: WDT reference clock is the 32kHz secondary oscillator
option.name: SOSC

setting.name: WRTSAF
setting.description: Storage Area Flash Write Protection bit

option.description: Low Voltage programming enabled. MCLR/Vpp pin function is MCLR.
option.name: ON

option.description: High Voltage on MCLR/Vpp must be used for programming
option.name: OFF

setting.name: CP
setting.description: UserNVM Program memory code protection bit

setting.default: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
setting.name: nWDTWV

option.name: WDT window violation reset has occurred
option.alias: WDT window violation reset has occurred

option.name: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
option.alias: WDT window violation reset has not occurred
